casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Marcus L. SPENCER. No. 364P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 25, 2007. Chris Z. Sinha, Assistant Attorney General, Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of July 2006 by Defendant for Dismissal:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of January 2007."
